Header: Cost of producing electricity unit to come down
Content: Minister Ravi Karunanayake says that steps will be taken to make the cost of production of a unit of electricity 15 or 16 rupees within two years. The Minister mentioned this while on n observation tour of Aaantee Leco Company in Bandaragama. Minister Ravi Karunanayake exchanged views with the workers of the company. A group of people including Parliamentarians were present on the occasion.
